snippet: MERMELSTEIN--Dr. Steven, on June 18, 2016. Beloved husband of Helene. Loving father of Dana (Martin) Weeks. Cherished grandfather of Carter and Jordan. Services Tuesday, June 21, 2016 at 9:30am at the Reconstructionist Synagogue of the North Shore, 1001 Plandome Rd., Manhasset, NY. For information contact Riverside Nassau North Chapels, 516 487-9600. 1/3
